description.value:
You send your spirit to torment another being’s dreams. Once per day, you may target a creature with the effects of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{Nightmare} spell. Instead of the spell’s normal damage, you make a full attack, using your Charisma modifier in place of your Strength modifier, against the victim’s touch AC. You deal 1d10 damage for each successful hit.

You must be at least 11th level before selecting this revelation.
